segment.source: How to Move an Application Group
segment.target: How to Move an Application Group

segment.source: How to Move an Application Group
segment.target: How to Move an Application Group

segment.source: How to Move an Application Group
segment.target: How to Move an Application Group

segment.source: In the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, you can use the following procedure to move an application group, which enables you to arrange your applications to suit your operations.
segment.target: In the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, you can use the following procedure to move an application group, which enables you to arrange your applications to suit your operations.

segment.source: You also can group them so that you can change the properties of nested groups simultaneously.
segment.target: You also can group them so that you can change the properties of nested groups simultaneously.

segment.source: In the left pane of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, expand Applications so that you can see the Application group you want to move.
segment.target: In the left pane of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, expand Applications so that you can see the Application group you want to move.

segment.source: Right-click the group and choose Move.
segment.target: Right-click the group and choose Move.

segment.source: In the Select Target window, navigate to the application group under which you want to place this group.
segment.target: In the Select Target window, navigate to the application group under which you want to place this group.

segment.source: The group, all its subgroups, and its existing applications now appear under the target group.
segment.target: The group, all its subgroups, and its existing applications now appear under the target group.

segment.source: This move does not change the properties of the group or its applications.
segment.target: This move does not change the properties of the group or its applications.

segment.source: You can select and move multiple application groups simultaneously.
segment.target: You can select and move multiple application groups simultaneously.

segment.source: In the right pane, use the CTRL-click or Shift-click key combinations to select more than one group.
segment.target: In the right pane, use the CTRL-click or Shift-click key combinations to select more than one group.
